meanings.definition: The act of walking or performing other activities while asleep.
meanings.sent1: Sleepwalking can be dangerous if not properly monitored.
meanings.sent2: My brother's sleepwalking always leads him to the kitchen in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent3: Last night, I found my cat sleepwalking around the house, looking for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze, with sleepwalking as the only way to navigate through her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the night was broken by the sound of sleepwalking echoing through the hallway.

meanings.definition: To walk or perform other activities while asleep.
meanings.sent1: I worry that I might start sleepwalking if I watch too many scary movies before bed.
meanings.sent2: She often sleepwalks when she is stressed out and has trouble sleeping.
meanings.sent3: The robot in my dream seemed to be sleepwalking through its programmed routine.
meanings.sent4: His feet moved as if sleepwalking, following a path only he could see in his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The old clock on the wall seemed to be sleepwalking, its hands moving in a slow, hypnotic dance.
